== dictionaries/rougail/00-base.yml

[,yaml]
----
version: '1.1'
var:
  description: a variable
  default: 9
  choices:
    jinja: |
      {% for item in trange(0, 10) %}
      {{ item }}
      {%- endfor %}
    return_type: number
    description: choice for 0 to 9
----
